description: Acquisition of a grooming mower for delivery to Alouette, Quebec, Canada
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
Published: May 5, 2023 - Tender Expiration: May 26, 2023 at 14:00:00 EDT

## Common Reference Numbers

* Solicitation Number: WS3969024261
* Reference Date: May 5, 2023 (Publication Date)
* Tender Closing Date: May 26, 2023 at 14:00:00 EDT

## Overview

Notice: This is an expired tender notice. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has concluded the procurement process for the acquisition of a grooming mower, as announced in this request for proposal (RFP).

## Acquisition Details

* UNSPSC Category: 21100000 (Agricultural and forestry and landscape machinery and equipment)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Saguenay, Canada

## Requirements and Documentation

* Annex "Statement of Requirement" outlines the technical specifications of the grooming mower.
* The tender submission, along with supporting documentation, must be received by May 26, 2023, at the latest.
* Bids submitted after 14:00:00 EDT will be treated as non-responsive.

## Procurement Information

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* End Use: Department of National Defence, Canada

## Contact Information

* Francois S. Martineau (Stephanie Trudeau, Administrator, Purchase, Property and Materiel)
* Email: [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Online Documentation

* Request for Proposal URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16189571?extsite=MTYxODk1NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16189571?extsite=MTYxODk1NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Online Registration

For more information about the tender, contact the procurement officer above. Please register in the Government Electronic Tendering Service to obtain the full bid documents.
